creator: hbalakrishna@yahoo.com
text:
HI 
I my application server(weblogic ) will connect to Apache 7443 and based on business to will route to another apache on 8080 frpm here to final back end server is OSB console 

O am receiving error at first Apache server i.e 7443

Weblogic App serve-->Apache 7443--Apache-8080---> OSB back end

our request is not going to OSB at all i m receiving error 
pass request body failed to X.X.X.X:8080  from Y.Y.Y.Y ()

Please help me . it is show stoper for my application

HI 

 my application server(Oracle weblogic ) and  it is  connecting to Apache 7443 and based on routing it  is rewiriting to another apache instance apache on 8080 from here to back end server i.e to OSB 

O am receiving error at first Apache server i.e 7443 only
Application flow

Weblogic App serve-->Apache 7443--Apache-8080---> OSB back end

request is not going to OSB at all i m receiving below error 
pass request body failed to X.X.X.X:8080  from Y.Y.Y.Y ()

Please help me . it is show stoper for my application
creator: hbalakrishna@yahoo.com

text: bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not for obtaining support.  users@httpd.apache.org might be able to help you sort things out.
creator: covener@gmail.com

text:
Sorry , I am getting this error since 1 year in 2,2,20 version. I request you to provide me some suggestion or solution if you already faced the issue earlier ?

Thanks
creator: hbalakrishna@yahoo.com

text: As Eric said, the user support mailing list is the proper way to seek help with your problem.  Here is a little more information: http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
creator: trawick@apache.org
